scripts.watch: watchify src/gui/main.js -v -o gui/main-bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react babel-preset-es2015 ] ] -t brfs
scripts.dist: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level QUIET --compilation_level SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT5 --js gui/main-bundle.js > gui/main-bundle.min.js
